result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp

When testing a table, if the first cell of the table refers to a class (after adding 'Fixture' to the end of the name) that does not extend Fixture, then the following message should appear in that cell:

Class fixtureName is not a fixture.


  • Here is a fitnesse page that should generate the error
The !path must point to fitnesse.jar
WouldBeFixture is a real class, but is not a Fixture
Action fixture
start Page builder
enter attributes Test=true
enter line !path ./classes
enter line !path ./fitnesse.jar
enter line |!-fit.testFxtr.WouldBe-!|
enter page NotFixturePage

Response Requester
uri status?
NotFixturePage?test 200

  • The error message should show up in the response

Response examiner
type pattern matches? contents?
contents Class fit.testFxtr.WouldBeFixture is not a fixture. true   HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Server: FitNesse-v20091014 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 933 href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/> <script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" onclick="doSilentRequest('?responder=stoptest&id=1')">Stop Test</a> </div> 125 <span class="meta">classpath: ./classes</span><br/><span class="meta">classpath: ./fitnesse.jar</span><br/><table
